version_description: "%" calculation rules: The rules of calculation applied to Apple MacBook(macOS) Calculator and iPhone Calculator are different. In previous versions ,the app follow the MacBook(macOS) Calculator rules . In the current version, the app follow the iPhone Ca

- 新的菜单可选项('按键尺寸') for iPhone: 在iPhone设备上可以根据使用习惯调整数字按键区域的尺寸
- 细节优化

- New option in the app setting menu ("Decimal point"): You can switch the display mode of "Decimal point" (switch back and forth between "." and ",")
*For Example
[100,000.1+50.5=100,050.6] --Switch Back And Forth-- [100 000,1+50,5=100 05

- New option in the app setting menu ("Type in size") on iPhone: You can adjust the font size in the input field
- Various small improvements

- New option in the app setting menu ("Type in size") on iPhone: You can adjust the font size in the input field
- Various small improvements
